name: Enikos
description:
Ενικός(Enikos): Derived from a greek word meaning Singular.

A rapturous land in the mountains, ruled by the capricious King Macio, is in turmoil. His biweekly tournament, The Bloodbath, has begun. For each competition, monsters are summoned, people are kidnapped, and brought to die for the entertainment of the evil king of monsters. This week, sisters in blood and steel Sindra and Embarre are thrown into the fray, and made to fight for their lives. Is there any hope for escape from the terrifying Enikos Theatre? Only you can see their journey through!
